What is the scenario to reproduce the problem?

I start Eclipse via debugger. I am in the test perspective with test navigator view visible. I have my test (RPT) open and modified. Then I exit Eclipse. I am getting prompted to save the test which I do. Eclipse exits and I see the exception in the debugger's console view.

From your comment I understand that you are using a product depending on TPTP
Can you reproduce the problem with TPTP only ? I want to rule out the possibility that this defect is caused by a bug in the product extension of TPTP.
As I cannot generate this exception with the latest TPTP 4.2 driver I will close the defect; reopen when you can reproduce the problem with the TPTP code
